when_to_say: Used to describe a place of work.
example: أذهب إلى المكتب كل يوم. (adhhab ila al-maktab kul yawm.) - I go to the office every day.

when_to_say: Used to describe a place where books are kept.
example: أحب القراءة في المكتبة. (uhibb al-qira'a fi al-maktaba.) - I love reading in the library.

when_to_say: Used to describe an educational institution.
example: المدرسة قريبة من هنا. (al-madrasa qariba min huna.) - The school is close to here.

when_to_say: Used to describe a higher education institution.
example: أنا طالب في الجامعة. (ana talib fi al-jami'a.) - I am a student at the university.

when_to_say: Used to describe an educational talk or class.
example: كانت المحاضرة مثيرة. (kanat al-muhadara muthira.) - The lecture was interesting.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a set of lessons on a particular subject.
example: أنا أدرس دورة في البرمجة. (ana adrus dawratan fi al-barmaja.) - I am taking a course in programming.

when_to_say: Used to describe a person who is learning at an institution.
example: أنا طالب في المدرسة. (ana talib fi al-madrasa.) - I am a student at the school.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who teaches.
example: المعلم يشرح الدرس. (al-mu'allim yashrah al-dars.) - The teacher explains the lesson.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a unit of learning in education.
example: الدرس كان صعبا. (al-dars kan sa'ban.) - The lesson was difficult.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a formal assessment.
example: اختبار الرياضيات كان سهلا. (ikhtibar al-riyadiyat kan sahlan.) - The math exam was easy.
